      • getResourcePackStatus

        public ResourcePackStatus getResourcePackStatus(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Gets the resourcepack status of the selected player. If there is no valid status then the status will be WAITING.
        Parameters:
        player - the player to get the status of
        Returns:
        the resourcepack status of the given player
